learning_objective: Compare and refine multiple algorithms for the same task and determine which is the most appropriate.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is preparing to participate in a powerlifting competition. Alex has two different plans to follow. Plan A includes strength training with high weight and low repetitions, while Plan B includes endurance training with low weight and high repetitions. Which plan should Alex follow to prepare for the competition?",
    "Answer1": "Plan A",
    "Answer2": "Plan B",
    "Answer3": "Follow both Plan A and Plan B simultaneously",
    "Answer4": "Neither Plan A nor Plan B",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "For a powerlifting competition, one needs to lift the maximum amount of weight in one repetition. So Alex would benefit more from Plan A which includes high weight and low repetitions."
}
